original_title: Fuel quota up from next month
original_body_lines: Fuel quota currently allowed on the National Fuel Pass QR system will be increased from next month's fuel price revision, the Power and Energy Minister Kanchana Wijesekara said.
He said the decision was taken at the meeting held yesterday afternoon with the CPC finance, commercial and marketing divisions.
He said the CPC cargo plan, finances and distribution plans were also reviewed during the meeting.
